description: DSP Read Data Port (Alias of SB_BASE+0xA)

comments: {bitfield:bits=8,bit[7]=Status{enum:1=Busy,0=Ready},bit[6]=0,bit[5]=1,bit[4]=0,bit[3]=1,bit[2]=0,bit[1]=1,bit[0]=0}Observed behavior on these cards is that bits 6-0 seem to contain a fixed value such that the byte read is either 0xAA or 0x2A instead of 0xFF or 0x7F. It is not known if these bits change over time.

{bitfield:bits=8,bit[7]=Status{enum:1=Data ready,0=No data},bit[6]=0,bit[5]=1,bit[4]=0,bit[3]=1,bit[2]=0,bit[1]=1,bit[0]=0}Observed behavior on these cards is that bits 6-0 seem to contain a fixed value such that the byte read is either 0xAA or 0x2A instead of 0xFF or 0x7F. It is not known if these bits change over time.
